___dnsServers.description: DNS servers to be used by this Virtual Network. This should be a comma-separated list of IP addresses.

$eref.description: Microsoft.Web/sites/slots/virtualNetworkConnections/gateways
ARM envelope properties

___hostingEnvironmentProfile.description: App Service Environment to use for the app.

___hostNameSslStates.description: Hostname SSL states are used to manage the SSL bindings for app's hostnames.

___enabled.description: true if the app is enabled; otherwise, false. Setting this value to false disables the app (takes the app offline).

___scmSiteAlsoStopped.description: true to stop SCM (KUDU) site when the app is stopped; otherwise, false. The default is false.

___hostNamesDisabled.description: true to disable the public hostnames of the app; otherwise, false. If true, the app is only accessible via API management process.

___cloningInfo.description: If specified during app creation, the app is cloned from a source app.

___dailyMemoryTimeQuota.description: Maximum allowed daily memory-time quota (applicable on dynamic apps only).

___serverFarmId.description: Resource ID of the associated App Service plan, formatted as: "/subscriptions/{subscriptionID}/resourceGroups/{groupName}/providers/Microsoft.Web/serverfarms/{appServicePlanName}".

___gatewaySiteName.description: Name of gateway app associated with the app.

___httpsOnly.description: Configures a web site to accept only https requests. Issues redirect for http requests.

___microService.description: Micro services like apps, logic apps.

___clientCertEnabled.description: true to enable client certificate authentication (TLS mutual authentication); otherwise, false. Default is false.

___clientAffinityEnabled.description: true to enable client affinity; false to stop sending session affinity cookies, which route client requests in the same session to the same instance. Default is true.

 Point-To-Site VPN connection.

 normally, use the POST /listKeys API instead.

ARM envelope properties

Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___configureLoadBalancing.description: true to configure load balancing for source and destination app.

___trafficManagerProfileName.description: Name of Traffic Manager profile to create. This is only needed if Traffic Manager profile does not already exist.

___sourceWebAppId.description:
ARM resource ID of the source app. App resource ID is of the form 
 /subscriptions/{subId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.Web/sites/{siteName} for production slots and 
 /subscriptions/{subId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.Web/sites/{siteName}/slots/{slotName} for other slots.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___cloneSourceControl.description: true to clone source control from source app; otherwise, false.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___cloneCustomHostNames.description: true to clone custom hostnames from source app; otherwise, false.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___appSettingsOverrides.description:
Application setting overrides for cloned app. If specified, these settings override the settings cloned 
 from source app. Otherwise, application settings from source app are retained.

___trafficManagerProfileId.description:
ARM resource ID of the Traffic Manager profile to use, if it exists. Traffic Manager resource ID is of the form 
 /subscriptions/{subId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.Network/trafficManagerProfiles/{profileName}.

___correlationId.description:
Correlation ID of cloning operation. This ID ties multiple cloning operations
 together to use the same snapshot.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.
Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

_88RampUpRule.description: Routing rules for ramp up testing. This rule allows to redirect static traffic % to a slot or to gradually change routing % based on performance.

___name.description: Name of the routing rule. The recommended name would be to point to the slot which will receive the traffic in the experiment.

___changeDecisionCallbackUrl.description:
Custom decision algorithm can be provided in TiPCallback site extension which URL can be specified. See TiPCallback site extension for the scaffold and contracts.
 https://www.siteextensions.net/packages/TiPCallback/

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___changeIntervalInMinutes.description: Specifies interval in mimuntes to reevaluate ReroutePercentage.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___minReroutePercentage.description: Specifies lower boundary above which ReroutePercentage will stay.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___reroutePercentage.description: Percentage of the traffic which will be redirected to ActionHostName.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___changeStep.description: In auto ramp up scenario this is the step to to add/remove from ReroutePercentage until it reaches MinReroutePercentage or MaxReroutePercentage. Site metrics are checked every N minutes specificed in ChangeIntervalInMinutes. Custom decision algorithm can be provided in TiPCallback site extension which URL can be specified in ChangeDecisionCallbackUrl.

___actionHostName.description: Hostname of a slot to which the traffic will be redirected if decided to. E.g. myapp-stage.azurewebsites.net.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___maxReroutePercentage.description: Specifies upper boundary below which ReroutePercentage will stay.

Push settings for the App.

___isPushEnabled.description: Gets or sets a flag indicating whether the Push endpoint is enabled.

___tagWhitelistJson.description: Gets or sets a JSON string containing a list of tags that are whitelisted for use by the push registration endpoint.

___dynamicTagsJson.description: Gets or sets a JSON string containing a list of dynamic tags that will be evaluated from user claims in the push registration endpoint.

___tagsRequiringAuth.description:
Gets or sets a JSON string containing a list of tags that require user authentication to be used in the push registration endpoint.
 Tags can consist of alphanumeric characters and the following:
 '_', '@', '#', '.', ':', '-'. 
 Validation should be performed at the PushRequestHandler.

 calls (for example: http://example.com:12345). Use "*" to allow all.

___isPushEnabled.description: Gets or sets a flag indicating whether the Push endpoint is enabled.

___tagWhitelistJson.description: Gets or sets a JSON string containing a list of tags that are whitelisted for use by the push registration endpoint.

___dynamicTagsJson.description: Gets or sets a JSON string containing a list of dynamic tags that will be evaluated from user claims in the push registration endpoint.

___tagsRequiringAuth.description:
Gets or sets a JSON string containing a list of tags that require user authentication to be used in the push registration endpoint.
 Tags can consist of alphanumeric characters and the following:
 '_', '@', '#', '.', ':', '-'. 
 Validation should be performed at the PushRequestHandler.

$eref.description: Routing rules for ramp up testing. This rule allows to redirect static traffic % to a slot or to gradually change routing % based on performance.

___name.description: Name of the routing rule. The recommended name would be to point to the slot which will receive the traffic in the experiment.

___changeDecisionCallbackUrl.description:
Custom decision algorithm can be provided in TiPCallback site extension which URL can be specified. See TiPCallback site extension for the scaffold and contracts.
 https://www.siteextensions.net/packages/TiPCallback/

___changeIntervalInMinutes.description: Specifies interval in mimuntes to reevaluate ReroutePercentage.

___minReroutePercentage.description: Specifies lower boundary above which ReroutePercentage will stay.

___reroutePercentage.description: Percentage of the traffic which will be redirected to ActionHostName.

___changeStep.description: In auto ramp up scenario this is the step to to add/remove from ReroutePercentage until it reaches MinReroutePercentage or MaxReroutePercentage. Site metrics are checked every N minutes specificed in ChangeIntervalInMinutes. Custom decision algorithm can be provided in TiPCallback site extension which URL can be specified in ChangeDecisionCallbackUrl.

___actionHostName.description: Hostname of a slot to which the traffic will be redirected if decided to. E.g. myapp-stage.azurewebsites.net.

___maxReroutePercentage.description: Specifies upper boundary below which ReroutePercentage will stay.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___hostingEnvironmentProfile.description: App Service Environment to use for the app.

$eref.description: SSL-enabled hostname.

___toUpdate.description: Set to true to update existing hostname.

___virtualIP.description: Virtual IP address assigned to the hostname if IP based SSL is enabled.

___hostType.description: Indicates whether the hostname is a standard or repository hostname.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___hostNameSslStates.description: Hostname SSL states are used to manage the SSL bindings for app's hostnames.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.
Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___enabled.description: true if the app is enabled; otherwise, false. Setting this value to false disables the app (takes the app offline).

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___scmSiteAlsoStopped.description: true to stop SCM (KUDU) site when the app is stopped; otherwise, false. The default is false.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___hostNamesDisabled.description: true to disable the public hostnames of the app; otherwise, false. If true, the app is only accessible via API management process.

$eref.description: Information needed for cloning operation.

___configureLoadBalancing.description: true to configure load balancing for source and destination app.

___trafficManagerProfileName.description: Name of Traffic Manager profile to create. This is only needed if Traffic Manager profile does not already exist.

___sourceWebAppId.description:
ARM resource ID of the source app. App resource ID is of the form 
 /subscriptions/{subId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.Web/sites/{siteName} for production slots and 
 /subscriptions/{subId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.Web/sites/{siteName}/slots/{slotName} for other slots.

___cloneSourceControl.description: true to clone source control from source app; otherwise, false.

___cloneCustomHostNames.description: true to clone custom hostnames from source app; otherwise, false.

___appSettingsOverrides.description:
Application setting overrides for cloned app. If specified, these settings override the settings cloned 
 from source app. Otherwise, application settings from source app are retained.

___trafficManagerProfileId.description:
ARM resource ID of the Traffic Manager profile to use, if it exists. Traffic Manager resource ID is of the form 
 /subscriptions/{subId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.Network/trafficManagerProfiles/{profileName}.

___correlationId.description:
Correlation ID of cloning operation. This ID ties multiple cloning operations
 together to use the same snapshot.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___cloningInfo.description: If specified during app creation, the app is cloned from a source app.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___dailyMemoryTimeQuota.description: Maximum allowed daily memory-time quota (applicable on dynamic apps only).

___serverFarmId.description: Resource ID of the associated App Service plan, formatted as: "/subscriptions/{subscriptionID}/resourceGroups/{groupName}/providers/Microsoft.Web/serverfarms/{appServicePlanName}".

___gatewaySiteName.description: Name of gateway app associated with the app.

___apiDefinition.description: Information about the formal API definition for the app.

___detailedErrorLoggingEnabled.description: true if detailed error logging is enabled; otherwise, false.

___alwaysOn.description: true if Always On is enabled; otherwise, false.

___requestTracingEnabled.description: true if request tracing is enabled; otherwise, false.

___experiments.description: This is work around for polymophic types.

___autoHealEnabled.description: true if Auto Heal is enabled; otherwise, false.

___httpLoggingEnabled.description: true if HTTP logging is enabled; otherwise, false.

___remoteDebuggingEnabled.description: true if remote debugging is enabled; otherwise, false.
